Room.Name: Carnival Midway
Room.ShortDescription: You are between a large booth to the south and the main midway to the north.
Room.LongDescription: Several smaller booths are around you, but the one to the south looks the most interesting. It seems to be selling charms and amulets, and you recognize the hyperactive elf standing near the back of the booth as a crazy old wizard. He was kicked out of the city of Brownhaven for causing the weather to do silly things. It rained frogs there for six weeks.
